%================ACRONYMS=================%
\newacronym{adcs}{ADCS}{Attitude Determination and Control System}

\newacronym{cmos}{CMOS}{Complementary Metal–Oxide–Semiconductor}
\newacronym{dcm}{DCM}{Direction Cosine Matrix}
\newacronym{ecef}{ECEF}{Earth-Centered, Earth-Fixed}
\newacronym{eci}{ECI}{Earth-Centered Inertial}
\newacronym{esa}{ESA}{European Space Agency}
\newacronym{fov}{FOV}{Field Of View}
\newacronym{geo}{GEO}{Geostationary Orbit}
\newacronym{gnss}{GNSS}{Global Navigation Satellite System}
\newacronym{gps}{GPS}{Global Positioning System}
\newacronym{gso}{GSO}{Geosynchronous Orbit}
\newacronym{imu}{IMU}{Inertial Measurement Unit}
\newacronym{leo}{LEO}{Low Earth Orbit}
\newacronym{lis}{LIS}{Lost-In-Space}
\newacronym{meo}{MEO}{Medium Earth Orbit}
\newacronym{svd}{SVD}{Singular Value Decomposition}
\newacronym{triad}{TRIAD}{Three Axis Attitude Determination}
\newacronym{quest}{QUEST}{QUaternion ESTimator}

\newglossaryentry{rotation_matrix}{type=symbols, name=$\bm{R}_n^b$, sort=rotation_matrix, description={Rotation matrix representing a rotation from n to b}}

\newglossaryentry{a_roi}{type=symbols, name=$a_{ROI}$, sort=a_roi, description={the size of the Region of Interest (ROI) in pixels}}
\newglossaryentry{a_mag}{type=symbols, name=$a_{MAG}$, sort=a_mag, description={the size of star in pixels (for star magnitude limiting)}}
\newglossaryentry{i_xy}{type=symbols, name=$I(x y)$, sort=i_xy, description={pixel light intensity at coordinates (x,y)}}
\newglossaryentry{i_thresh}{type=symbols, name=$I_{thresh}$, sort=i_thresh, description={limiting pixel light intensity for considering only bright enough pixels}}

\newglossaryentry{i_max}{type=symbols, name=$i_{max}$, sort=i_max, description={limiting star brightness in star magnitude unit (the higher $i$, the dimmer the star)}}
